contextId.information: To be "shaken" is an idiom for being afraid. AT: "no one would be frightened away from trusting in Christ" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
Paul was describing his own emotions by using an idiom. AT: "I could not longer wait patiently" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
contextId.quote: I could no longer stand it

contextId.information: This is an idiom that expresses living a satisfied life. AT: "we are very encouraged" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
